title: Scheduled power cuts from today
content: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) announced yesterday (21), scheduled power cuts will be implemented today (22), in response to the Ceylon Electricity Boardâ€™s (CEB) request.CEB has requested manual load shedding for tomorrow due to a lack of fuel for several power plants with a combined capacity of 541 MW.PUCSL Chairman Janaka Ratnayake said two-hour power cuts will be implemented between 4:30 p.m. and 10:30 p.m. for the areas listed in Groups A, B, and C in the manual load shedding schedule. Meanwhile, power cuts lasting three hours will be imposed in the areas mentioned in the other groups.
